_description: The Madman’s Song — one eight-line stanza

Bod851.First Lines:
Be god & seinte hillareMi clerk was of il
                    lare…
Bod851.Last Lines: …Riht with hir ers barHad pist in þis wistil
Bod851.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 1.259-60.
